channel.title: Sponsored ad
channel.description: Is it really worth it? I know it goes for over 300$ a month and i looked at the serve that have it and most of them only have like 10 players online... Im looking to get an ad but i dont really know whats good and whats not so if this isnt good then what is?

item.title: Sponsored ad
item.dc:creator: @rs614 rs614
item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

No, mitb WILL NOT ban, i see every month least 5 users who wont pay, but next month i see them bidding again.
Ive been allways keeping my bids between #12-15, cause i know ill get bumped to top 10 in few days.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsored ad
item.dc:creator: @luka2005 luka2005
item.description:
@luka2005 wrote:

I personally don’t know, but im going to be buying a sponsorship soon, its a matter of if people like your server, moparscape can guarantee that there will be people coming online, but The actual question is, is your server good enough to keep them logged in?

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsored ad
item.dc:creator: @antirock75 antirock75
item.description:
@antirock75 wrote:

Funny how mitb doesn’t remove and ban people who didn’t pay in 24 hours. I know they own popular servers but still. There should not be exceptions. I know I would get banned.

zu4gbd.png585×598

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsored ad
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Doobage, post:2, topic:464787”]1. Affiliating with other servers they advertise on your site, you advertise on theirs you share the community
2. Youtube vids
3. Advertising on chat boxes
4. Advertising on other servers <- Please don’t do this.[/quote]awful. don’t do any of these.

yes, the sponsored advertisement, in my opinion, is completely worth it. usually servers go from 10-15 on average amounts of active members, to 40-60.

Read full topic

item.title: Sponsored ad
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

callmedragon:

Is it really worth it? I know it goes for over 300$ a month and i looked at the serve that have it and most of them only have like 10 players online… Im looking to get an ad but i dont really know whats good and whats not so if this isnt good then what is?

That should pretty much explain if it is worth or not.

Personally, the best way to really get invovled possibly is:

  1. Affiliating with other servers they advertise on your site, you advertise on theirs you share the community
  2. Youtube vids
  3. Advertising on chat boxes on top sites
  4. Advertising on other servers <- Please don’t do this.

If you want to pay for it, give it a shot but it is no guarantee.

And tbh in my OWN personal opinion, RS servers are pretty dead population wise. You may get a handy few people but, it don’t seem quiet as active as it was when Silab’s Client was God back in the day.

Read full topic
